short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools to help during the maiar dex launch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tools to help with calculatios during  elrond maiar dex launch:
- Withdraw bootstraping: calculates how much of the EGLD-MEX pool you have to unstake to swap for the LKMEX you have earned
- Denver Calculator: splits the LP you have into 66% and 33% parts so you can restake and make a bigger MEX printer
- APR Calculator: Calculates earnings of every farm based on your balance and the return of each farm
